metadata.title: Implement WebSocket Log Streaming for Real-Time Logs

story.iWant: real-time log streaming via `rgrid logs exec_abc123 --follow`

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Given** execution is running 2. When** I run `rgrid logs exec_abc123 --follow` 3. Then** CLI opens WebSocket connection to API 4. And** runner streams logs to API via WebSocket 5. And** CLI displays logs in real-time (< 1 second latency) 6. And** logs continue streaming until execution completes or user cancels (Ctrl+C)
